code:
graph TD
    subgraph "Tree Detection"
        PLR[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> SCAN[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        SCAN --> LOGS[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        LOGS --> CLUSTER[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        CLUSTER --> BASE[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        BASE --> CHECK{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}
        CHECK -->|No| ADD[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        CHECK -->|Yes| SKIP[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        ADD --> TREES[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    end
    
    subgraph "Tree Cutting Process"
        REQ[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> LLM[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        LLM --> COORD[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        COORD --> MOVE[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        MOVE --> START[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        
        START --> HEIGHT[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        HEIGHT --> FINDLOGS[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        FINDLOGS --> HASLOG{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}
        
        HASLOG -->|Yes| CUT[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        HASLOG -->|No| NEXTH[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        
        CUT --> EFFECTS[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        EFFECTS --> WOOD[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        WOOD --> MORE{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}
        
        MORE -->|Yes| HEIGHT
        MORE -->|No| NEXTH
        
        NEXTH --> MAXH{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}
        MAXH -->|No| HEIGHT
        MAXH -->|Yes| DONE[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        
        DONE --> MARK[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        MARK --> COMPLETE[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    end
    
    subgraph "Cut Tree Registry"
        MARK --> REGISTRY[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        REGISTRY --> KEY[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        KEY --> PERSIST[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        PERSIST --> PREVENT[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    end
    
    style SCAN fill:#e8f5e8
    style CUT fill:#ffebee
    style EFFECTS fill:#fff3e0
    style REGISTRY fill:#f3e5f5
repo_description: Intelligent Agentic NPCs for Minecraft with LLM Integration
